00002 // File: D3DRes.h
00003 //
00004 // Desc: Resource definitions required by the D3DApplication class.
00005 //       Any application using the D3DApplication class must include resources
00006 //       with the following identifiers.

00009 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00010 #ifndef D3DRES_H
00011 #define D3DRES_H
00012 
00013 
00014 #define IDI_MAIN_ICON          101 // Application icon
00015 #define IDR_MAIN_ACCEL         113 // Keyboard accelerator
00016 #define IDR_POPUP              142 // Popup menu
00017 #define IDD_SELECTDEVICE       144 // "Change Device" dialog box
00018 
00019 #define IDC_ADAPTER_COMBO         1002 // Adapter combobox for "SelectDevice" dlg
00020 #define IDC_DEVICE_COMBO          1000 // Device combobox for "SelectDevice" dlg
00021 #define IDC_ADAPTERFORMAT_COMBO   1003
00022 #define IDC_RESOLUTION_COMBO      1004
00023 #define IDC_MULTISAMPLE_COMBO     1005 // MultiSample combobox for "SelectDevice" dlg
00024 #define IDC_REFRESHRATE_COMBO     1006
00025 #define IDC_BACKBUFFERFORMAT_COMBO 1007
00026 #define IDC_DEPTHSTENCILBUFFERFORMAT_COMBO 1008
00027 #define IDC_VERTEXPROCESSING_COMBO 1009
00028 #define IDC_PRESENTINTERVAL_COMBO 1010
00029 #define IDC_MULTISAMPLE_QUALITY_COMBO   1011
00030 #define IDC_DEVICECLIP_CHECK      1012
00031 #define IDC_WINDOW                1016 // Radio button for windowed-mode
00032 #define IDC_FULLSCREEN            1018 // Radio button for fullscreen-mode
00033 
00034 #define IDM_CHANGEDEVICE     40002 // Command to invoke "Change Device" dlg
00035 #define IDM_TOGGLEFULLSCREEN 40003 // Command to toggle fullscreen mode
00036 #define IDM_TOGGLESTART      40004 // Command to toggle frame animation
00037 #define IDM_SINGLESTEP       40005 // Command to single step frame animation
00038 #define IDM_EXIT             40006 // Command to exit the application
00039 #define IDM_HELP             40007 // Command to launch readme.txt
00040 
00041 
00042 #endif // D3DRES_H
